caption: Very average. The staff seemed over loaded, but the wait staff was friendly and as attentive as possible. Beers were just Ok (I had their "hoppiest" selection of 4 beers, the 808, Eee, rye and skinny jeans. They were lacking a depth. The hop ending was there, but no nose nor richness. We had the pizza, burger and hummus plate. The hummus had 0 flavor and was very gritty. The pizza sauce also lacked flavor, but the cauli crust did have a good taste and fantastic texture. The burger was the bright spot to the meal. The cook was spot on and the meat was delicious.

I know what your thinking, here's another brewery with bar food. Well you're right. Yes, it is another brewery and they do have bar food, but it's pretty good.  Being situated on a corner lot, there is lots of seating to allow you to enjoy the semi outdoor dinning and people watch on the side walks as the hustle and bustle goes buy and your enjoying your beer or what ever drink seems best to wet your whistle.  As most breweries do, they offer tasting flights and they do have a pretty big selection to chose from. I normally like what I like, but when in such a place, enjoy taking part of sampling the house brew offerings.  So as far as the food, yes it is bar food and the usual suspects are on the menu, but I tried the Gyoza Sausage Sandwich and was very impressed. It was packed and yummy with an assortment of toppings that added taste contrasts. Got it with the onion rings and they were pretty impressive as well, but if you need something on the lighter side, you can get a healthy side salad option that is actually a healthy salad.  Staff were your typical for this type of joint. Friendly and attentive, but probably short lived in this type of industry.  Our overall experience was good and will probably be back next time in the mood for this type of beer and food experience.  Whether you are a local or tourist, if you just want to be in a place to drink good beer and have good bar food, this is the place. Nothing more and nothing less.
I wish I could give six stars. Beer was amazing....had a few that were not great (that's my opinion, you may love the ones I didn't). Had the bbq pizza, it was phenomenal.

(Translated by Google) No service at all. It is passed through a dark table without water, and the tip fee is written on its own. A store with a damn waitress.  (Original) ろくにサービスもしない。水も出さず、暗いテーブルに通され、勝手にチップ料を記載される。くそウエイトレスのいる店。
No wait. Clean bar. Digital menus. Really great brews. Great pizza with GF cauliflower crust option.
Good stuff!
Host was exceptionally friendly.
Great food, service, and beer!

Drinks were great, food was good, service was ok. Our group was asked multiple times (by the same person)if we had checked, in leading us to believe that he forgot us. Especially after he told us we were being seated, and where then watching him seat other people there. Eventually we were seated and apps came out quickly. Drinks shortly after apps, but follow up from server was non-existent. Punch, Mai Tai, and Shandys recommended.
Great meals a great service. We had 8 people and not one complaint about the food.
My friend loved several of the beers.  I was happy the brewery served mixed drinks and they had a wonderful happy hour.
Nice and clean music is 1970.or 1980 but easy listening some parking available at la Moana.entrance lot .drinks are.well presented and people's employees seeing to want to serve you and do there best

Brutal.  Worst service on the island.  We were seated at a table, and then ignored for 20 minutes.  Tried to get a server multiple times.  Completely snubbed.  Guess they hate tourists here and don't mind showing it.  Locals got seated after us and got prompt service.  Skip this awful place and hit Maui Brewing instead.

Fantastic! Service, food, BEVERAGES...all fantastic. Prices are a good value for the great quality. The bartender may have a slightly heavy hand making the cocktails 🤪😋 making the price even more reasonable. Highly recommend the pulled pork Cuban. You should also definitely try the jalapeño mouth beer or even better as the michelado!
Great beer and service...I wouldn't order food from this place again.
Great beer and great beer
Good food and good beer, good space management with Covid restrictions in mind!

Solid place. Lots of spacing for COVID and open air seating. Lotta TVs too, if you want to watch the game. Some of the food is really good, like the pork fried rice. I don't really like beer too much, so I can't speak to the variety or quality.

Got there at 2:30 PM. First thing,  Nobody was in the host podium to seat people. I waited there for about 10 mins after finally someone came to help. Got seated, I ordered a Pulled pork pizza and a beer, which was excellent. The only reason I gave this place a 3 stars is because the service is bad. I asked my server for a glass of water before order food because I was thirsty and after so long waiting, the food and beer came first than the glass of water. I have to mention that place wasn’t even crowded by the time was there! Just lacking of customer service, that’s all

They asked me to keep a mask on until there was beer in front of me. I walked out without ordering.  Right and so having a beer in front of me or not makes what kind of difference? Please provide the scientific studies and medical journals supporting your rationale. Not CDC guidelines.

I’ve eaten at just a few restaurants in my time. This was the worst service I’ve ever had. I thought about being honest and up front by letting them know what should have been acceptable service but I decided not to verbalize... I try to give everyone the benefit of the doubt but there was not a bright spot in the service.  We were served about a 6oz cup water just after we were sat. (That water was never refilled nor asked about over the 30-45 min sit down/meal)  Ordered our app and one of the plates that came with was very dirty. It didn’t look like it made it through the wash since the person before had eaten off of it. (Was not checked on, or asked “how is everything”)  As we ordered, the server asked if we wanted sauce on the side. We all said yes with the addition of another sauce. But when the food was delivered, all the sauce was forgotten and we had to flag them down to get assistance.  A different server brought out our meals, 2 beef burgers and one veggie burger. When they were brought out, they were unaware one was a veggie burger and didnt know it belonged.  Again. Though the whole process, we were never checked on, water refilled, confused orders, dirty plate, just zero care for their table. Perhaps it was a fluke but wow... Pretty sad.. And it may seem like I am being salty, but honestly I/we didnt ask for but we felt forgotten about. They still made more money that what was truly deserved so you can blame me for enabling poor service. Mahalo.
Food: excellent Beer: excellent Cocktails: so good Service: terrible Location: busy street
Good food selection and great drink selection. They did a nice job with social distancing. Dollar for dollar, our favorite restaurant/bar while we were visiting Oahu.
Nice staff, great food, excellent beer, nice airflow, feel safe here.

First of all the servers are on point🤙🏼Hands down the best....I repeat the best grilled chicken sandwich in the history of mankind. Mind you im from the mainland and have chikfila on the daily(almost)...Waikiki brewing company beats it...
Came here twice. On 12/26/2020 and 2/5/2021. Food and drinks are okay.

Awesome place to hang out with great drink and food selection. It is about a 10min walk from Hilton Hawaiian Village.  The service is wicked fast. During both of our visits this week the service was impossibly fast that we couldn’t believe it ha. The food was super fresh and the menu had great variety. I highly recommend!!
Food is excellent. Service is slow as a snail. Had to get manager to help speed things up.
Great food, beer and atmosphere! Burgers and onion rings are delicious.

Ugh! I did a DoorDash pick-up here twice. Staff members were rude both times. One informed me, "We don't do online orders! Can you take a seat outside?!" Message to staff: "Smile. Just once. Just see what it feels like. At least there’s an OCEAN ACROSS THE STREET.” Oh... and the food was cold.
Hidden gem 💎 downtown. Check it out. Bar, fried rice and gyoza sandwich 🥪 was phenomenal...great beer and pizza. American food.

Only ordered the pork tater tots and the spoonful of pork was echoed on a recent review. Wish I had read it before ordering. It was a order to go and I did call them and they shared another tiny cup of the pork that I walked back down to get but I was embarrassed I even made the effort. You will get a ton of tater tots.
Great service, beer and food!!
Nice selection of beers for really all tastes. Food menu also very good. The prime rib burger is fantastic!
Award winning beers with a hometown vibe!? I'm in!
The drinks and food were very good! The waitress was also very nice, and it's just a nice place overall.

Nice atmosphere to drink beer but I had the pulled prime rip slider ( something like that) and it was very soggy. My husband had the barbecue bacon cheeseburger, no barbecue sauce no flavor. Beer and fries were good.

Horrible onion rings, they are the frozen cornmeal junk, that everyone hates. You would think a Brewery would have beer battered rings... The micro spoonful of pork on the tiny sandwich was salty as eating pure salt. The BBQ sauce was amazing, but that's about it. Their bbq seasoning for the fries is just tons and tons of paprika, and ruins the fries and tots. Not recommended.

Waitress really didnt care... Was made to feel uncomfortable food was not worth the 10 blocks walked to get there n another 10 blocks back to hotel... I could have went to mcdonalds half the price n quicker ...

My girlfriend now fiancée went here 3 times in 8 days during our stay between Christmas and New Years. The girl hosting remembered us and was so nice always coming over to chat. The bartenders were attentive and nice as well. The plexi glass in between the seats at the bar was a cool idea. Even better the beer. It was delicious and the prices for tequila shots during happy hour. Can’t wait to come back and visit. Mahalo for the hospitality!
Good food and good service... inside is a bit loud but outside is much better for dining.
Horrible service.  He barely checked on our table.  Good food and beer. But we Left irritated.
Good was good, beer was good as well. Worth a visit if you've never been before.
Literally worst service I’ve ever had. Rude, condescending and disrespectful.

We went yesterday during happy hour and their beers were ok I definitely prefer Maui Brewing Company’s beers for sure. We didn’t get much of a variety of food only wings and fries. Their wings weren’t that good they were just ok but I’d say but the fries were good. Good atmosphere though but not sure if I’d come back.
Good food, local beer, and beer cocktails. Lots of tv’s with a solid sports bar vibe.
Loved it!
Food and service was excellent!! Coconut shrimp was amazing 😊
Regular pub

The bar is open, they have plexiglass to divide it up into chunks. The BBQ Bacon Cheeseburger really hits the spot. The fries were tasty too. And of course the beer is great. It's a nice addition back into the Waikiki dining and drinking scene.

Good location. Went right before the post beach crowd got there. The line got huge behind us after the sunset and the people that were at the beach came out, like around 6:30. Pizza was okay, wings were good. Loaded tater tots were great. Beer was great. Got a flight to taste a few of their beers! Def would go back.
Good beer for Happy Hour. 9 to choose from for 5 bucks.
Great Food. Great Beer.
Great spot for a cold one, locally brewed, awesome selection. Loaded pulled pork tots and the giant onion rings did it for me, simply amazing👌🏽 The EEE PAH Ipa was my fav by far, 🍺
Excellent food with marginal service. There are lots of TVs if you like to watch sports. The beer is actually really good from all different types.
(Translated by Google) Drink comparison is good 👍  (Original) 飲み比べがいいね👍
Food is very good but I think my favorite are the onion rings.
Savannah was awesome and I had the best shandy (Ginny skeans)!
Burger and prime rib sandwich were both delicious.  My wife customized her prime rib sandwich. Visited while on vacation.
Loved it! Food was Great. Family friendly!

Savannah our server was very nice and professional. Did a great job. Food was good. Beer was great, michilata was awesome with the jalapeno beer Chris was great at the bar. Although there was a rude lady there, telling us we couldn't stand up away from our tables. I was only trying to speak with our server.
Fantastic place near the shore to relax and have a brewski.  Didn’t try the food, but it must be nice for the locals to have a chill spot for mainland favorites.
Breezy and tropical place for food, beer and drinks 👍

Dine in open and great social distancing but cook needs lessons on grilling veggie burgers, my impossible burger was flat, hard and overdone. And since when does dry greens pass for super slaw? I was told its under different management from previous covid.

Great place. We’ve been on the island for three days so far and been to this place about five times. Great food and drinks. The kids menus could have more than three items on it but it’s still good. That also may be a condensed Covid menu.
Good food. Some tasty beers too!
Good food paired with great service.
Amazing brewpub in an amazing location. Beer was good, vibe was good, service was good. All around a great spot for a few drinks.
Very welcoming and service friendly and very helpful. The bartender's were great too!!
Awesome beers, food and staff. I love it.

Great beer and savory food. We were able to get a table in less than 10 minutes even with the packed crowd and Thursday night football going on. The servers and hostess were so welcoming. Ill be here on Sunday for the football games!
Great remodel. Love it! Coconut shrimp 🍤 ❤ awesome staff
Like what they did with the place after the pandemic. Completely different feel.
I had three tasters: Hana Hou Hefe, Aloha Spirit Ale, and Jalapeño Mouth. Hana Hou Hefe was delicious. Server was friendly. Would have appreciated more water.

Two older men working approached us at the host stand and aggressively declined service because we were one person over capacity. We understand and respect COVID restrictions but they were unnecessarily rude...something felt off. Power trip?
(Translated by Google) It was delicious  (Original) 美味しくいただきました

this brewery was hands down my favorite we were able to visit on the island. the service was a bit sub par but the beer was exceptional. i don't remember exactly what we drank but we tend to lean towards IPAs and/or an interesting ingredient or two. the location was also fairly close to our hotel but we only stopped by one time.

Closed/abandoned due to coronavirus and has been taken over by homeless at night. I would avoid the area if you can as they often harass people walking on the street. Wish the owner would do something.
Good local place to enjoy local bear

Awful service and mediocre bar food at best! Wanted to get away from the tourist traps and this place had great reviews online so we wanted to give it a go.... would never come back, nor recommend anyone to come! The queso was hard and the pretzel was cold on the inside! The wings were pathetic! The cheese steak was beyond a joke (see photo of miscut bun and lack of filling), the bbq CHx pizza would’ve been better if it came from Trader Joe’s frozen section! The fish and chips (not pictured was a laughing stock of fish& chips! disappointed #letdown #syscofoodfriedup #notlocal #notfriendly #watereddownmargaritamakesmemad

Beer was good. Service was decent. Food took a long time. Part of it came out cold. Waited 15 minutes for a side to be replaced. Finished the rest of the meal and cold side never came out. They generously discounted our $19 entree by $2.85. Not a good way to fix a straight up missing item and a bad experience. Problems are opportunities, this one was missed by a long shot.
(Translated by Google) If you use Happy Hour, you are the king of good luck ^^ The staff are friendly!  (Original) 해피아워 이용하면 가성비 왕입니다^^직원이 친절합니다!
Good food, great beer, outdoor ambiance is perfectly Hawaiian!
Good little brewery.   Has Happy hour two to five and late night.  Good beers
Went there twice while in Honolulu, both times absolutely amazing food and the Jalapeno Ale was the absolute BEST!!
The food is great, and service is excellent, will definitely be going there again 2/22/2020

(Translated by Google) I went to a hamburger restaurant .. Beer was fine, but the hamburgers are cooked so much that I enjoyed many. In the end, Patty cannot eat. The atmosphere is completely local. The onion rings were very large and really delicious when they were freshly fried. It just cools down and you feel it soon. If you have ketchup or sriracha sauce, you can beat it.  (Original) 햄버거 맛집이라 해서 갔는데.. 맥주는 괜찮았지만 햄버거는 너무 덜 익혀나와서 누린내가 많이 남. 결국 패티는 못 먹고 남김. 분위기는 완전 로컬 맛집 분위기. 어니언링은 한조각이 무척 크고 갓 튀겨 나왔을땐 정말 맛있었름. 다만 금방 식어서 곧 느끼해짐. 케찹이나 스리라챠 소스가 있으면 이겨낼 수 있음.
The best pizza we had on the island! The portion sizes are large so sharing amongst a couple is very doable.

(Translated by Google) Superb atmosphere! Very good food! Great burger! Home brewed beer! The place is top completely open!  (Original) Superbe ambiance ! La nourriture très bonne ! Super burger ! Biere brassée maison ! L'endroit est top complètement ouvert !

(Translated by Google) You can drink the beer you are making here. Craft beer was very good. The snacks are also voluminous and delicious. It is an atmosphere that you can easily drink, but it can also be used as a proper meal. Next I want to eat burgers.  (Original) ここで作っているビールが飲めます。 クラフトビール、とてもおいしかったです。 おつまみもボリュームがあって美味。 気軽に飲める雰囲気ですが、きちんとした食事としても使えます。 次はバーガー系を食べてみたいですね。
Great beer, great food, great service...... needs more seating.

(Translated by Google) A trendy craft beer that has increased in Hawaii Good because you can walk from the Hilton Hawaiian Village. Beer lovers can drink a little cheaper during happy hour. You can buy assorted canned beer at the store. When I went there, there were no Japanese people and the local colors were strong. You can also order a hamburger at the next cheeseburger shop. delicious. Ahidip was Tuna Mayo  (Original) ハワイでもだいぶ増えた流行りのクラフトビール ヒルトンハワイアンビレッジから歩いて行けるので良い。ハッピーアワーで少し安く飲めるのもビール好きには◎。 店で缶ビールのアソートパックが買える。 行ったときは日本人はゼロで、ローカル色が強かった。隣のチーズバーガー屋のハンバーガーも注文可能。旨い。アヒディップはツナマヨだったかな
Lots of Hawaiian beer. I like them all.
2nd stop of the night. Better vibe here than at Maui Brewing. More laid back. Beer was equally as good but you could actually hear the person next to you.
Great beer, Great prices, Greater staff. Wish I had found this place earlier in my trip!

(Translated by Google) Ladder from Maui Brewing.  ◆ What I asked English Brown Ale $ 5.50 It is really big even in small. The taste is like brown ale, rich black and blond half.  ◆ Review It's large, you can drink with a tap, and you brew beer in the shop. It's gradually increasing in Japan. There are a lot of TV monitors here, and they are always broadcasting live sports. Even one person can use it at the counter.  (Original) マウイブルーイングからのハシゴ。  ◆頼んだもの イングリッシュブラウンエール　5.5ドル スモールでもマジでかいです。 味はブラウンエールらしい、コクのある黒とブロンドのハーフみたいな味。  ◆総評 広くて、タップで飲めて、しかも店でビール醸造もしてて。日本に少しずつ増えてますよね。 ここはテレビモニターがたくさんあって、常にスポーツ中継流してます。 1人でもカウンターでしっぽりいけます。

(Translated by Google) Bar 10 to eat a hamburger and drink a beer. A little removed from the other tourist sites, so it is much calmer.  (Original) Bar nota 10 para comer um hambúrguer e beber uma cerveja. Um pouco afastado dos demais locais turísticos, então é bem mais calmo.

Wasn't very far from my hotel, and I almost pasted it.  Very family friendly, clean, and polite staff, you can enjoy a laid back experience.  The food is a little pricey, but after a turkey burger and two beers, my total damage was about $30-not too bad.  Hawaii prices I suppose.  The beers I had seem very similar to those on the continent, so a little disappointing.  The burger, however, had a very grilled flavor, so I chalked it up as "local."  I had a good time, relaxing and watching "American Ninja Warrior despite the weather.

(Translated by Google) The staff are really friendly. Hana hou Beer is really good. The onion rings and the beer are so great that it's a good match ... the 👍prime burger also tastes like a delicious homemade burger. The two girls ate prime burger, onion ring and two beers and were really full and onion rings were half wrapped. There is quite a lot of food. If you ask me to wrap it, please give me the packaging!  (Original) 스태프들이 정말 친절합니다. Hana hou 맥주 정말 맛있어요. 양파링이랑 맥주랑 먹으니까 궁합이...크으...👍prime burger도 맛있는 수제버거 맛이납니다. 여자 둘이서 prime burger, onion ring,맥주2잔 시켜서 정말 배부르게 먹고 양파링은 반쯤 싸왔어요. 음식 꽤 많이 나오는 편입니다. 싸달라고하면 포장용기줘요!

I was very impressed with their beer. Everything we had was delicious. Any brewing company that can make their blonde ale exciting is a plus in my book. We had the bbq pizza and it was pretty good! All in all a good time. Would highly recommend!
Good beer and great service. Food is simple and could use a bit more seasoning.
Really great food. Burger and chicken sandwich!!!
Great place, good beer, and convenient location right by the hilton village. Perfect for the average tourist or the seasoned local!
Cool place, decent prices, not fast service, but good beer

Went mainly for the food. Just ok chicken sandwich, too less portion for the price. Pizza was subpar, pressure they used store bought base because it tasted like sweet cardboard. One of the cocktail (Coco lychee cooler or something like that) tasted like water, like no alcohol on it!
Went here Sat 11/10/19 great beer, not so great staff. No smiles, had pizza and no plates offered.  Just used my napkin.
Best place in Waikiki for craft pours. Friendly and not pretentious staff. Solid beers on tap. Fun atmosphere. Pretzel went great with my flight ✈️🍺
Both the food and beer were amazing! I ordered a tofu salad. The tofu was cooked to perfection and seasoned in one of the best ways I’ve ever tried it!

I absolutely love Waikiki brewing company beer! Food’s taste is good sometimes I don’t like the temperature of the food. But server always make it right again. One time I didn’t like the fries because it was not warm enough, and the waiter brought me whole new hot fries right away.  Also it is outdoor place, so it is pet-friendly which is really important to me!
A nice local brewing company - a good selection of brews, good appetizers and dishes. Stop by!

We went here for really good hamburgers that are served with excellent sides. I got the superfood slaw which was excellent. It seems to be two restaurants in one. We sat in the part called the Blue Bar which is spacious and with a high ceiling.

Disappointed with the Hana Hou.  Brewery offered to take back the remaining 4 of the 6 pack for analysis and replace with 6 pack of y choice.  I'll give the porter a try.  One star for Hana Hou.  4 stars for trying to make it right.
Very cozy place. Beer was nice of course, but the foods were also great!

Customer service was not good. We had been firstly sitting at the bar looking to have a drink.....ignored and after 10 or more minutes we sat at a table inside as originally we had asked to sit out only to be told all tables were booked. They were clearly not...eventually after a good 20 mins we waved a person down to ask for drinks. We ordered our food as the waiter was walking off...he didn't ask whether we would like food.  Pork belly with soggy bread with a few pickles on the side for my husband. I had the kale salad...can't muck that up. All the time we were there there were outside tables available. The waitress came with our food and even though the customer service was so bad we still HAD to give a tip. I thought people got tips for good service. Would not go back. Bad value for money and bad service.

Good beer at reasonable prices (Sample $ 2 per glass / Regular size $ 6.5 per glass).  There are some interesting and good varieties.  Especially the jalapeño ale one should try.  Also IPA and Stout were good.  We ate nothing, so no idea how it is.  There are also beer cocktails and happy hour is from 1pm to 3pm and 9pm to the end.  Then the beer costs only $ 5.  Staff is nice and helpful.

It’s a decent bar... good enough beers (nothing mind blowing, but all are solid)... the food is FAR overpriced, and the service is always paltry (I’ve been coming here since they opened, hoping for an improvement, but it’s just the level of the establishment, I think). It’s definitely worth stopping and having a beer, but just don’t go expecting anything special. It’s pretty run of the mill for a brewery, and pretty over priced compared to some of the other establishments offering better food.

(Translated by Google) There were many different types of beer and many first tastes. The tempura is also crispy and delicious! I drank six beers for one fish and chips and was full. We recommend going to Happy Hour!  (Original) 맥주 종류가 다양하고 처음 마셔보는 맛들이 많았어요. 튀김류도 바삭하고 맛있습니다! 피쉬앤칩스 하나에 맥주 여섯 종류 마셨더니 배불렀어요. 해피아워에 가시는 것을 추천합니다!
Interesting beers... but not in a good way

(Translated by Google) Very kind I'm so sorry that I don't have a Korean menu I'm sorry for the lack of wet tissue But the restaurant is so kind that the score goes up. I don't know much about alcohol, so I sample it and taste it. (2 $ for 1 sample) There are two of them today The dark beer tastes like a copy and personally, the 5th hana hounhefe tasted a bit lemon Skinny jeans ipa tastes so bad Anyway, it's a beer shop, but it's said that the hamburger tastes good, but the hamburger is uniquely dipped in broth. If you want a quiet restaurant, you can go somewhere else and just eat American handmade beer shop ^^  (Original) 굉장히 친절함 한국어 메뉴가 없어서 너무 미안해하고 물티슈가 없어서 또 미안해하고 하지만 너무 친절해서 음식맛이 절로 점수가 올라가는 호프집 술을 잘 모르니 샘플로 시켜서 전체 맛을 보고 난 다음 (샘플 1잔에 2$) 2가지는 오늘 없어서 7가지만 맛보는걸로 흑맥주에선 카피맛이 나고 개인적으론 5번째 hana hounhefe가 약간 레몬맛이 나서 좋았다고^^ Skinny jeans ipa 맛도 나쁘지 않은거 같당 여튼 맥주집인데 햄버거 맛나다고 해서 왔는데 햄버거는 독특하게 육수에 찍어 먹는데 약간 느끼할수도 있으니 개취에 맡기겠음.. 스포츠바 같은 느낌으로 티비를 크게 틀어두기 때문에 조용한 레스토랑을 원한다면 다른곳으로 가시고 여긴 그냥 미국식 수제맥주 전문점 ^^ 잘 먹고 갑니다
Great burgers and boutique beers.  Convenient location.  Highly recommended.

Not a huge selection of beers but that’s just my opinion on what I like - I had to stick with the blond and I’m an IPA girl. Their skinny jean beer is good but was hoping for another ipa on draft there. Staff is friendly but not very attentive, sat with an empty beer for a while. Music was also grunge and emo. Not my favorite brewery in town.
Great service. The philli steak sandwich was salty and the ahi had no flavour.

Cool little brewery with an awesome bartender - Mariah, who knows more about beer than anybody I’ve ever met. I didn’t eat, just stopped in for a couple beers and had a great time talking to the guests at the bar and Mariah about beer. You can order food from them or from Cheeseburger Waikiki which they share a kitchen with. The seating is all outdoors but covered.

(Translated by Google) It is the second use, but was very good this time. Both beer and food were very good. I would like to use it again if there is an opportunity.  (Original) ２度目の利用ですが、今回もとっても良かったです。ビールも食事もとてもおいしかったです。 また機会があったら利用したいと思います。
Absolutely fabulous place,  great range of beers made on-site and brilliant food... a must Visit when in town...
The food was ok the beer was good. One of the female bartenders just wanted to complain the whole time. It took awhile for us to get service but it was a Friday night.

Small open air bar, though it is covered, next to a burger joint, which provides the food. Roughly a dozen beers on tap with flights and full pours available. The beer is decent, and leans towards the simple side. An ok stop, but there are more exciting breweries on the island.

Visited twice and that's enough. The first time, I sat at the bar and had an awesome experience. The beer was tasty, for sure. I also had the fried pickles, which were amazing. Excellent, 10/10 experience. . Two days later, I dragged my friends there, guessing about the pickles and beer. This time, the beer was still great but the pickles were... non-existent. Not really a problem, except the server seemed to forget to order them. Then, he told us they run out of batter. By then, my burger was cold since I'd planned to add the pickles as a topping. My friend skipped ordering because she's planned to eat the pickles that never arrived. Such a simple thing ended up as a terrible downer because the dude wasn't upfront about his failure to order to the app. . I won't go back (since I'm back to the mainland soon), but I advised you to sit at the bar where they know their business.

The Waikiki Brewing Company make their own craft beer on-site, as evidenced by their huge beer-making tanks behind the bar. It also turned out to be a great place for a casual and relaxing dinner with some excellent quality food. We enjoyed the tasty Brewmasters cheeseburger, flavourful Kalua pork Cuban sandwich and crunchy fries, which all paired well with the local craft beers we sampled. The service was quick and friendly. A pleasant way to end our stay in beautiful Honolulu!
They had some good beers and food. I really liked the fried pickles they were really tasty. The server was really nice and attentive it was a good experience.
Great selection and new releases, perfect place to watch the raptors win the NBA finals!
Quesodilla so good I had to eat it before I took a picture.

(Translated by Google) Nice terrace, good beer. A little expensive, but we are in Waikiki, we must expect!  (Original) Belle terrasse, bonne bière. Un peu cher, mais on est à Waikiki, on doit s'y attendre!
Best beer on the island
Great little place with a great atmosphere. Loved the beer.
Awesome beer selection. Great people serving great food. Hit the happy hour!
Great food and drinks
Good food, good beer!

As far as the beer, it is a legit place to go. Try the jalapeno IPA. The food was a little bit disappointing. I got the Kalua pork Cuban. Pork was dry and salty, I'm sure they use the packaged kalua pork from store. They better off cooking their own pork. Other than the food, good place to go for beer
Favorite brewery on Ohau!.  The Jalapeño Face and Poke are both top shelf.  A must visit whenever I'm in Waikiki.
Cool place, good brews
Great beer, nice vibe. Unhurried and good place to hang out with friends or just have a drink.

Solid, but generally basic beer selection. The Black Strap Porter was fantastic, and unexpected. The remaining beers are stalwarts of most breweries (an amber, wheat, hefe, red, etc), though they have a twist (such as the hefe being made with strawberry puree).  I did not have a chance to try anything from the food menu this visit, although I was drooling over the prime rib French dip delivered a few seats down the bar. The salads looked pretty impressive as well.  Service was generally good given the number of customers.
Great atmosphere, good location.
Great beer, good service, tasty apps
was waiting for the burger 1 HOUR!!!ITS HORRIBLE! CAN'T GIVE EVEN 1 STAR!
The fried pickles and Cuban are my favorites.  Always awesome.  All the beers are great. I live the English brown ale.  Staff is always on point.
Good food, good beer, good patio. They have a small parking lot.
Really great beer! I found the food less than awesome...
Wonderful food, drink and service! It's away fromt the hussle and bussle of Waikiki, which we love.
Went on a school night with some friends from work and some mainland guests. Really good product and friendly helpful service.
(Translated by Google) It is a small brewery. I can compare beer drinking. It is recommended.  (Original) 小さなブリュワリー です。ビールの飲み比べが出来ます。オススメです。
Nice place. Tried their EEPAH IPA. Crammed all that equipment into the space. Would definitely go back. 7 min walk from Hilton Waikiki village.
Great staff, food and brews!
Great Beer, Great Food
(Translated by Google) Counter, at the center of the terrace, while watching the brewing tank, you can drink comfortably.  (Original) カウンター、テラス中心で、醸造タンクを見ながら、心地好く飲めます。

(Translated by Google) I regret that I should have tried all types at the tasting set first Still I drank 7 out of 8! Impression that it was not so different from citrus and jalapeñyo The color is completely different ~ For Hawaii, I felt cheap pricing.  (Original) 先に味見セットで全種類試せば良かったと後悔 それでも８種類中７種ゎ飲んでみた！ 柑橘系とハラペーニョ以外それほど違いが分からなかったという感想 色は全然違うのにね～ ハワイにしては安めの価格設定な感じがしました。
Grood burger... better beer!
Great food, drinks and hospitality. My new favorite place in Waikiki.
Very good burgers and some very tasty beers! Had a flight and it was with it. The jalapeno beer was surprisingly good!
Great beer, food, & company!
This place is da bomb. Really nice staff. Great food and great beer at amazing prices.
(Translated by Google) Good variety of beer and very rich food.  (Original) Buena variedad de cerveza y muy rica comida.
Good Beer, Casual Atmosphere, great burger!
Great beers, a bit pricey but it's located in waikiki so it's excusable

(Translated by Google) Walking along Kalakaua Avenue is at the intersection corner and it is easy to go. Beer is tasty, but hamburger is also delicious so I recommend it. Happy hour from 3 pm to 5 pm Homemade beer can be drunk for 5 regular drinks in 5 dollars.  (Original) カラカウア通りを歩いて行くと交差点角にあり、行きやすいです。ビールも美味しいけど、ハンバーガーも美味しいのでオススメします。 午後3時から5時までハッピーアワーで自家製ビールがレギュラー1杯5＄で飲めてお得ですよ。
(Translated by Google) Kindness, polite. I enjoyed beer with confidence.  (Original) 親切、丁寧。安心してビールを楽しめました。

Staff had no idea about gf on the menu, asked in kitchen but then disappeared. The entre never arrived, cutlery was only delivered at the end when I managed to catch her for a napkin - no sauces provided. Daughters drink enquiry was never responded to so she got none. Only concession to gf was a bun that was substituted but I'm pretty sure there was no awareness of cross contamination. Very underwhelmed and would not recommend to anyone with gf or coeliac requirements.
Rather disappointing with a waitress who didn't know the menu, missed items off the order and napkins and cutlery delivered after the burgers were mostly finished. Can't recommend this in any way...

We went on two separate nights. Both times, the service was friendly and excellent.  The burgers were good. The wings and pickles unfortunately weren't great (both were surprisingly spicy). The brews we had on day one were good (blonde ale), the second night, the Porter had an off sour quality to it.  It was ok, but with so many great choices in Waikiki we probably could have skipped it.
Tried the veggie based burger and it was pretty good.  Paired with the black honey saison
Food is limited and okay. The beer is plentiful and delicious!!
Excellent beer, amazing burgers served by personable staff. What more do I need to say? Eat here! Drink here!
Best beer ever,
Tasty beers, delicious food, amazing atmosphere, and superior customer service!
Great beer the people are always so friendly.
Great beer. Great conversation. The nuance of why I love beer can be found here in abundance. A home away from home.

Great food and it is serve in big serving , nice ambience and also the staff and crews are very accommodating.We had a good time also listening to their Hawaiian music.You can choose the food that fits your taste because they have a variety of burgers,pasta,chicken and a lot more.Unwind with their local beer also.
username: Allain Jing World Travel Couple in Love

caption: It used to be a great place to have decent priced beers, but now they've decided to charge $8 for a 16oz beer, totally not worth it anymore.

Great local pints for around $6, friendly staff, & the poke is pretty solid.  I frequented this place when I lived down Waikiki. Yesterday I stopped in on a visit from North Shore & continue to be satisfied. It's the only onsite craft brewery in Waikiki & I'm happy they don't have prices reflecting that. Yesterday we had fried pickles & poke; the house made pickle batter was perhaps the best I've had. I'll always make a point to stop here when I'm in Town.
Good beer, salad quite pricey for a rather small salad.
Perfect atmosphere and awesome bartender, wish I knew her name but she helped with the choices and everything. Very knowledgeable and shared her favorites as well. Love this place!!
Nice local brewery with quite some options. I wouldn’t recommend the food here though...they don’t have their own kitchen so the food you order here is cooked by the restaurant right next.
Nice microbrew with friendly staff.
Best brewery on Oahu by far!

Actually we had a nice evening until the waiter Mohamed approached us. He has asked where we are from and after telling him that we are from Germany he started to ask racist questions. We felt very uncomfortable. I would not go there again.

Small little brewery off the main strip. Their selection of beers is quite good. My friends and I got samples of 6 of their beers. Reminds me of home and our small-batch breweries in Vancouver, BC. The servers were friendly. This place sits adjacent to a burger joint and is a fun little place for people watching or getting away from the usual Waikiki crowd.
Just had a few cocktails. They were great. We plan in going back later to try some food
Errrrmerrrrgerrrrd try the poke or the fried pickles!

Tried three different beers, two of which I liked. Service was quick sitting at the bar counter. I ordered the chicken quesadilla and it was a good portion size for dinner but could easily be shared with other appetizers for multiple people.

(Translated by Google) I came to Hawaii by surfing ☀ It seems famous for being a craft beer store  (^ o ^) /  15 minutes from Waikiki Beach, we will walk a bit. 🚶➰  In addition to 8 types (?) Craft beer such as IPA and Aloha spirits, you can also enjoy dishes ((((゚ ∀ ゚ *) o)))  Why do not you visit once?  (Original) サーフィンでハワイに来たときに来店☀🌊🏂 クラフトビールのお店があるということで有名だそう＼(^o^)／  ワイキキビーチから15分、少し歩きます🚶➰  IPAやアロハスピリッツなど、8種類（？）のクラフトビールのほか、料理も楽しめる(((o(*ﾟ∀ﾟ*)o)))  ぜひ一度行ってみては🎵
Great place! Great servers! Amazing food! Love it there!
Great burgers and beer!

Love this bar - a little further away from the main shopping strip, so usually not overcrowded. They brew their own beers and the staff are knowledgeable and friendly. Nice little menu with good quality bar food.

This bar is on a patio adjacent to a burger place, and it's a great place to drink some beer and watch sports or people (it's open to the sidewalk/street). Our group tried several brews (and the best shandy I've ever had), and were impressed with all of them. The food menu is a bit limited, but looked tasty, and the bartenders were friendly and knowledgeable.
Place was awesome, friendly and engaging hostess and the appetizers and drinks out of this world.
Only a few things on the menu, but that are all great. Good beer selection.
Good food. Good beer. Good friends. What more do you need?

Found this great place while staying in Waikiki.  The staff are very friendly and it immediately felt like "our" home town bar.  Became the regular stop for my son and I. Rachel, Maria and Rory all made us feel like "locals" and not the tourist we were.  Great Beers and better times Thanks again we will be back!! Mike and Jake Rose

Awesome staff and amazing beer selections locally brewed. They rotate 3 beer flavors (limited time), as well as, have a great selection of constant flavors, so whether you like to be adventurous or find a favorite, this is the spot. They also have top notch appetizers and entrées, so not only are they experts at brewing beer, but they also specialize in making sure that you don't walk away hungry! Be sure and check out what Waikiki Brewing Company is all about, whether you are a local or just in town for a short time!
Atmosphere was pleasant and sociable. Staff were friendly and prices were reasonable. Beers had serious faults but guests seemed happy.

Hands down one of the best Brew pubs in Oahu. I've been dreaming of their beer and fried pickles since my first visit in 2016...  They have a diverse selection of beer and it tastes exactly how it is described. New since my last visit is the Jalapino Mouth which is nice and smooth with great jalapino flavor. Their fried pickles are wonderful, their staff.is courteous and outgoing. Plus the outdoor seating is great. A must try in Waikiki!

There are many brewpubs in Waikiki. They're fine. But only this one feels like a comfortable neighborhood pub. And their jalapeño beer, the Jalapeño Mouth, I feel like I've been waiting my entire life to taste.
Had a nice point of Irish Stout.  Good chicken wings.  Nice outside setting.  Reasonably priced.
Great burgers and craft beers

Hidden next to Cheeseburger Waikiki, they have a good selection of craft beer at an unbeatable price for the location. It’s a good place to stop and grab a beer surrounded by lush vegetation, carved Tikis, and beer production. Try the Porter - it’s award winning and delicious!
Great Bruticulous Maximus and Hummus. Bicycle friendly unlike the place on Cooke St.
Love the beer. Food pretty good too! Most of the staff look like they could use a shower and some fresh clothes 😆 probably not as easy considering it’s an open air place but still..

(Translated by Google) You can drink it at the manufacturer. There are several types, but the one I drank was IPA. I bought 6 packs as souvenirs.  (Original) 製造元で飲めます。数種類ありますが飲んだのはIPAですね。お土産に6パックを購入しました。
Good beer selection. The staff is extremely friendly. Fun trivia night.
Food was excellent!! Great breakfast deals!! Staff friendly will visit again !
Tiffanni was awesome and picked out a great pair of flights. Great beer, location, and service. Also the cheeseburger place looks good next door
Always great - great beer, great service, great food - all the bartenders are friendly and knowledgable.
(Translated by Google) I'm glad that there is a shop near Hilton where you can drink craft beer.  (Original) ヒルトンから近場でクラフトビールが飲める 店があって嬉しいです。
Poke was average, black strap molasses porter was good

Nice little Brew house. A couple IPAs on tap. Decent price for Waikiki. I didn't eat so no comment on the food. Servers were attentive but more talkative with the regulars. If I wasn't by myself I probably wouldn't have noticed.

Food decent; service bad. We came here as a night to get away and enjoy our evening. Our waitress was good, however, they took a while to come and see us then after we ordered, it was like we were invisible. Two waitress’ were notified the restrooms were out of toilet paper and scoffed and ignored us because it “wasn’t their job.”  The rest of the staff minus our waitress and the manager (at times) seemed very rude and arrogant (seemed as though they favored others).  Beer isn’t terrible. Food isn’t bad. (Beans came out cold at first and then tasted like dog food)...besides that, things were fine. Staff seems unfriendly and rude compared to most places; local or not.
Great place for a bite and a beer

I visit these guys every time I'm on O'ahu (third year running). Solid brews, super friendly and knowledgeable bartenders, and the fried pickles (from sweet and sours, which is pretty unique) are tasty. Always a good way to waste an hour or so. Definitely try their IPAs, and don't pass on a pour of the Jalapeno Mouth...solid amber ale with fresh jalapeño added to it.
(Translated by Google) Delicious beer and snacks! There are not many snacks.  (Original) 맥주와 안주가 맛있음! 안주가 다양하진 않음.
Great service and beer!
A cool place to grab a beer
Good Beers & Pub Food 🍻
Great brewery, and the staff was nice. Didn't take long to get a beer!

This is a perfect example of a local, neighborhood brewpub that is world-class. Using fantastic ingredients from around the island and around the world, they produce some incredible beers. Luckily this Brewery has their own canning equipment, making it easy and more cost effective to enjoy their brew. The staff was extremely helpful and knowledgeable about the menu as well as their complement of brews. My visit was during a vacation and I and my sister in-law were given a brewery tour of the almost 1 year old brewing setup. Andy, the brewer who gave us the tour, did an amazing job, instilling us with a history of the brewery but also of.brewing on the island. It was perfect. Cheers! Oh... The food? I've lived in some of the biggest BBQ states and the BBQ here was solid with an island twist! Portions and price were good as well!

Brunch + craft beers = a perfect Sunday in Waikiki. One of us sampled a flight of beers. Some of us had Mai Tais which were delicious. I had the Bloody Mary which was absolutely delicious! It was the gift that kept on giving. It came with brisket, shrimp, and a whole chicken wing. I was definitely not disappointed! The BBQ platter and the Eggs Benedict were delicious! The service was also very good. If you're into craft beer, you'll definitely want to stop in.

(Translated by Google) There is no seat information, so you can sit in your favorite vacant seat. A gentle hall person will tell you how to order. For $ 2 a glass of craft beer, you can compare 4oz trial drinks.  (Original) 席の案内は無いので空いている好きな席にすわります。注文は優しいホールの人がおすすめなど教えてくれます。クラフトビールが1杯2ドルで4ozのお試し飲み比べができます。
(Translated by Google) Nice place with outdoor tables to enjoy a good craft beer.  (Original) Bel posto con tavoli all'aperto per gustarsi una buona birra artigianale.
Liked the beer
Nice relaxing atmosphere.  Great Chicken Quesadillas!
(Translated by Google) The older sister in the hall didn't come to hear my order.  (Original) ホールのお姉さんがオーダーを聞きに来てくれなかった。
Great beer and food!
Great service, order the Skinny Jeans IPA
Drove half an hour + half an hour looking for parking to be turned back at 5pm cause the place ain't kid friendly's after 4pm...
Great service .. good brews and food a must stop place when you are here

Had a flight of beer including the blonde, amber, brown, and barleywine of theirs. Thought the brown and blonde were alright, but nothing spectacular. The outdoor scene feels like Hawaii and so the atmosphere here for me was on point!  Overall, a great place to walk in, grab a pint, and head to the beach for a potentially great sunset in front of Hawaiian Hilton Village on Waikiki Beach—in late May/early June, that’s just after 7:00 PM local time.

(Translated by Google) If you are a western Waikiki accommodation such as Hilton Resort, it is worth visiting on foot. I recommend having a sampler to taste and add something you like. Each has its own unique beers, but there are some that are very good for the public taste. The snacks are also American, but I think it's okay. The boss and staff are friendly and they seem to close at around twelve.  (Original) 힐튼리조트등 와이키키 서쪽숙소라면 걸어서 방문해 볼 만 하다. 샘플러를 시켜서 맛을 보고 맘에 드는 것을 더 시키는 것을 권한다. 각기 특색있는 맥주들이지만 대중적 입맛에도 아주 괜찮은 것들이 있다. 안주또한 미국식이지만 나름 괜찮다는 생각이다. 사장과 직원들이 친절한 편이고 열두시 정도면 문을 닫는 것 같다.
Great beer, food, and people! Always a good time
Music teleported me to the 90s. Great service and decent food, though. Very good beer!

The Jalapeño Mouth beer was delicious, of the 3 jalapeño beers I’ve had this one wins.  The burgers are large and tasty and the Cuban sandwich was good as well.  Not much seating in here but worth the wait.
Nice drink and brewed beers
(Translated by Google) Aloha Spirits is recommended!  (Original) アロハスピリッツがオススメ！
The hefe and the jalapeno amber are awesome. Neat little open air brewery right off the street in Waikiki.
Great burgers and beers.

Great spot away from the beach for a sit down pint or two. A solid standard draft lineup with a few specialty pours. My bartender was a perfect mix of simultaneously being both chill and attentive 🤙. Cool open air seating. We only had the deep fried pickles but they were bomb. Wasn’t too busy on a weekday afternoon but it probably won’t stay that way for long
Drinks and food are great! Service was a little sparse and slow.
Awesome local brewery always pumping out great beers. Burgers and wings are a a must to have with the beer
Great beer. Great atmosphere. Delicious tuna poke
Nice beers. Good food. A bit of traffic noise, but worth a stop.

Great beer and friendly staff. Saw a couple of men cleaning the boil kettle and I asked if I could look inside. They showed me the kettle and the mash tun and explained how it all worked. Great experience!
Excellent bar service, cozy atmosphere. Love the open air bar. Easy to find and friendly staff.
food ok.  beer ok.  server seemed annoyed with our questions.
The burgers were delicious and there was a good selection of beers. The tasters were reasonably priced and the happy hour after 9 was well worth hanging out until after 9.
Great beer selection.

Hit the 3 -5 Happy Hour ($5 pints). The beer (Pale and Blonde Ale) was OK, I've had much better. The Kahlua Pork Cuban sandwich and Tomato Avocado Watermelon sale were tasty. Location is handy to the Waikiki hotels and the ambience was enjoyable. Wish the beer was better.
Good craft beers. Some with some kick.
Great overall experience with scaring staff & solid craft beer selection. Outdoor atmosphere is perfect for Hawaii. Food was very good.
Beer is cold and very tasty , the tuna pokie  and hummus  appetizers were very good. Beer and scoobie snacks for happy hour 😎
Enjoyed the Kakaako locations. Delicious food and the beer Rocks!!!!! Beth was super.
Friendly staff Very good service & good beer
Vanessa, Chris, and Christina..... fabulous! The food and beer(s) are spectacular as well!
Nice outdoor brewery. Great place to rest your feet after an afternoon of walking around site seeing.
Great beer   great food.  Great people!
Kind bar tender and a variety of craft beers - available in shot (sample)

Usually this place is good. We came a little later 630? For dinner. The Mac and cheese was dried out and probably microwaved before we got it. We normally don't complain but this time we did. They comped the meal. Hope it's better next time.
(Translated by Google) Craft beer shop Hamburger and food menu are also delicious  (Original) クラフトビールのお店 ハンバーガーやフードメニューも美味しい
Great beer! Delicious food and great service!!!
Great!
Good food and beers.
Nice beers!! Food was a bit expensive though
Great hamburgers, great beer, great people. Nothing more to say :)
The beer is great, but get the chocolate porter cake, it's really good and only $5. (Serves 1)
Nice location on the corner.  Great beer good prices and friendly service. Hope they do well and thrive
The Hana Ho wheat beer is the best ever. Plus the charred romaine shrimp salad was great.

(Translated by Google) The atmosphere of the shop is good and the staff is friendly and you can walk from the Hilton Village. Burgers can also be ordered from the attached cheeseburger shop. If you like craft beer, you can enjoy it!  (Original) お店の雰囲気も良いしスタッフもフレンドリー、ヒルトンビレッジから歩いていけます。 併設のチーズバーガー屋さんからバーガーも取り寄せられます。 クラフトビール好きなら楽しめるはず！

Service was okay, flight of beers I had was very good. We order an order of the hot chicken wings and they came reasonably fast and tasted good. Worth stopping to check out some more local beers and maybe an app but would not use this small menu for a sit down dinner.

A short walk out of the heart of Waikiki shopping precinct is Waikiki Brewing Company. A boutique brewery that offers a great selection of traditional and craft and beers as well as some fusion and modern cocktails. The self selection tasting platter is a great way to decide  With the added bonus of two separate happy hours one of which is from 9:00pm until closing is another nice touch.  Well worth the walk and we will definitely be back.
Pretty much the only craft brewing option in Waikiki. Good food, great staff, and some terrific beers! Ask about the specials as they do some unique infusions sometimes.
Great beers and a good menu to go with them.
Great place! After 4, however, if you're under 21, you can't enter.
Loved the burger and beer
Wonderful local beer, cocktails and inspired food. Great breezy setting. Plays great tunes too.

Beer is okay. Nothing to write home about. They are definitely trying to make a go of it on the brewery end...as you can see from walking up.  Prices are okay. Little disappointed when I ordered a burger and it came out under cooked... considering burgers are the bulk of the menu. Server made it right and brought out a new cooked burger. Parking is very tiny. You will need to park down the street and walk.  Overall, if you are close in location and want a drink or aren't particular about having a 4star meal it's okay.
The Prime Rib Burger was insane! I am coming back for sure you guys are awesome!

Great place to visit!  Great service, awesome food and amazing beer!  Didn't know what to expect, but this was a great stop and a chill place.  I rarely leave a five star, but they earned it!  Beer was all "to style," which I prefer. Good variety of beers, all appropriately hopped and malted. Plus, they had a couple more locally influenced beers, like the hefeweizen, which are a great spin on a traditional style.  We also tried the ahi poke, which was a good quality and fresh but simple dish.  No real negatives aside from the terrible 90's Pandora station, it that's the worst part of the visit then I am a happy camper!
(Translated by Google) The macaroni cheese was delicious.  (Original) マカロニチーズが美味しかった。

Very friendly staff. Portions of food was enough for two. Really enjoyed the burger. I  enjoyed the many topics for trivial night Easter Sunday and the egg hunt.  Only negative thing to say is hubby was not given right shirt and didnt notice the mistake till we arrived home from vacation...bright side is i will enjoy it this summer lol
Very friendly personnel, super chill place, ok beer and food. Will most def come back on my next visit in Honolulu.
The atmosphere is good. The staff is pleasant. Beer is delicious. I'm going for three days in a row.
Mariah and Nathan are top shelf, along with the 808 Pale, and the IPA.
Had the Cuban sandwich and pale ale. Very clean and tasty food and and beer. Highly recommended.

The beer was average and the app that I had was good but not great.  I am from the PNW and the craft beer scene is insane and full of amazing breweries and beer. The atmosphere is casual and fun but the beer average and the food (had the wings two ways: BBQ= not worth it. Honey Sriracha= Very good) was average to above average
The beer's very good. The food's pretty standard pub stuff, neither good nor disappointing. The lack of soft drinks other than Coke and Sprite, however, is disappointing.
Absolutely fantastic beers and service! 10/10

Open front, chill bar and grill type of place, with vegetarian options, just a short walk from the Hilton Hawaiian Village.  The open front makes it a nice place to dine at night and really enjoy the weather (you're in paradise, after all.) …
Very cool atmosphere, with excellent food and great brews. Highly recommend the Ahi Poly and the Pork Cuban with a side of Jus

Reminded me of beer gardens back home in Wisconsin. If you visit Waikiki whether a local or tourist this place is a must visit. I can only speak for the IPA's but they were fantastic. The food was great, atmosphere was better and the waitstaff was top notch.  Reallly wish I could give more stars because it was that great of an experience.

Nice beers and decent burger. Sliders were so so. The whole arrangement with waikiki burger next door doesn't work very well: i had to go buy my girlfriend's smoothie myself which took me about 15 minutes.

Simple place serving drinks and food. Recommended for anyone who is in the area and doesn't  want to travel far for a beer.  Pros - Cold Beer - Open front to enjoy the weather - *Close (Depending where you are staying)  Cons - Service: I noticed a few comments about the service before going so I wasn't expecting much. They weren't that attentive and overall just seemed like they were just trying to get a tip and get out. - Food & Beer: Overall average and edible but hot sauce helps.
A little brew pub with tasty food! We loved the beer, and we had some sliders to share that were so delicious! Friendly servers, a fun mix of tables, tv's for sports.

If you are looking for a new experience for beer I would recommend trying it out but it is not a place I would pick for a good meal. There are several craft beers that are brewed on site that offer a good variety from light to dark beers. The food portions are rather small for the price and are lacking in satisfaction. The fries tasted like reheated McDonalds fries and the Truffle fries were little more than regular fries with Parmesan cheese sprinkled on top.
(Translated by Google) Enjoy delicious craft beer. The food is also delicious with the peel. Recommended for beer lovers!  (Original) 美味しいクラフトビールが楽しめます。料理もピールに合って美味しいです。ビール好きにはオススメ！

The one bartender seems to have an attitude, still waiting on my bill even after she took my card. Food was good but I won't go back or refer anyone to the Waikiki Brewing company, they took my card for payment of some else's bill. This  place is stupid and irresponsible. First time here, last time here
Fast service, great beers, and great food.
Didn't live up to hype but I had no complaints
My favorite brewery in Honolulu
Cool spot,  beers are nothing amassing.  Just ok and below.  Good food since it's attached to cheese burger place,  but or seems like they are both understaffed
(Translated by Google) Great beer, which they brew themselves. Fast service.  (Original) Отличное пиво, которое варят сами. Быстрое обслуживание.

(Translated by Google) The world is in the midst of the craft beer boom. A popular tourist destination, Hawaii Waikiki, has been increasing recently. In 2015, the famous cheese burger store GM opened their dream micro brewery “Waikiki Brewing Company” next to the burger store. Although it is a small space in the center of the counter, it is popular to enjoy the original crab beer that has been carefully finished. There is a brewing tank in front of the counter, and craftsmen are brewing. Hop flavor is very good. It may not be easy to meet such an attractive counter. There are 8 types of craft beer. Pale ale, IPA, porter, etc. are fully covered. I received a brown ale and a porter, but it was really fresh. It feels like drinking fresh wheat soup. Samplers are also available so you can find your favorite craft beer. There are only a few food items that are perfect for beer. The menu of the adjacent cheeseburger store can be ordered. I received an IPA for finishing, but I feel good. Perhaps it was because I was drinking at this counter wrapped in the scent of hops.  (Original) 世界は、クラフトビールブーム真っ只中。人気の観光地、ハワイワイキキでも近頃増えているそうです。2015年、有名なチーズバーガー店のGMが、夢であったマイクロビール醸造所「ワイキキブリューイングカンパニー」をバーガー店の隣にオープンさせました。カウンター中心の小さなスペースですが、丁寧に仕上げられたオリジナルのクラブトビールが楽しめると人気です。カウンターの目の前には醸造タンクがあり、職人がせっせと醸造中。ホップの香りがとてもいいですね。こんな魅力的なカウンターには、なかなか出会えないかもしれません。クラフトビールは、全部で8種類。ペールエール、IPA、ポーターなどしっかり網羅されています。ブラウンエール、ポーターをいただきましたが、実に瑞々しい。フレッシュな麦のスープを飲んでいるような印象です。サンプラーも用意されているので、好みのクラフトビールが見つかるでしょう。フードは、数こそ少ないですがビールにぴったりのメニューばかり。隣のチーズバーガー店のメニューも、オーダーできるようです。仕上げにIPAをいただきましたが、ほろ酔いいい気分です。このカウンターで、ホップの香りに包まれながら飲んでいたからでしょうね。
(Translated by Google) All very good! friendly and professional staff  (Original) Tutto buonissimo! personale cordiale e professionale

Cool outdoor bar and patio setup along Ala Moana. It's entrance is adjacent to the Cheeseburger Waikiki and I think you can order food from both. Both the beer and food were good. They have a couple TVs too that typically has sports on.
They have great food and great beer.
Nice place.  The hefeweizen was unimpressive, made bitter on purpose.  Odd.  The Amber was decent and the Brown was very nice.  Porter was a bit disappointing though, weak on flavor.
Great environment and the staff were friendly!  Drink selections were good too
Jalapeño Mouth and the English Brown were awesome. Also loved the jalapeño margarita. Didn't eat there so can't comment on the food.
Beers were good. I was a fan of the Jalapeño Mouth. Friendly waitstaff.
The perfect getaway from the fruity cocktails and overpriced resort diners. Breezy outdoor sitting, amazing staff, and fantastic beers. If you like brews and you are in Waikiki check this place out.
Great beer and best playlist in waikiki!

It was our first day in Waikiki went here bc I love beer. Beer was great we ordered food and it took forever, the waitress came out said they overlooked the order but they were working on it right away. The guy, I think owned the place, came out apologized he also took $20 off our bill and kept coming back to make sure everything was good. The beer and food was great but for me the way they handled the mistake says alot about this place!  Definitely would check this place out!
Excellent brews...makes Kona beers look like what they really are...bad mass market beers.  Good food menu higher end pub grub.
Awesome place! Great atmosphere. Friendly service!
Had the Cuban, which was amazing!  Great beer, cool atmosphere, and awesome service.  If you enjoy visiting brewerys, this is a must.

Great craft beers (and cocktails) and excellent service from Nate!  Enjoyed trying their randall beer experiment (Monday special).  Loved the open air atmosphere and the hospitality. Hopefully we'll have time to go back and enjoy the food!
Great food and good beer. I had the sausage sliders which were fantastic and my wife had the mac & cheese. To drink I had their Eee Pah IPA and my wife their shandy. Overall a great place.

Great beer and great service! We walked by the first time without noticing the sign... Entrance is to the left of cheeseburger place. The burger and the roast beef were awesome. Kale salad was overdressed, but otherwise would have been good.

Awesome selection of brews. I was amazed that they've been open under a year with such a selection. The food is good, too. They share a kitchen with the cheeseburger restaurant next door. Try the jalapeño and the hefe beers... Super tasty. Best of luck to WBC!
Great beer and food!
This place is legit! Finally a microbrewery in town!
Excellent beer. Excellent beer food. Excellent service.

Really tasty beer. Great service staff! Excellent food!  It's a nice, small, quiet patio a short walk from the Hilton village. This place is an absolute must for beer fans, but for those who aren't drinkers the food and atmosphere definitely doesn't disappoint.
Nice spot at the quieter end of Waikiki. Nice selection of brews and a small but tasty menu. There is also a small free parking lot!
When I go to the brewery I feel like I am at home.  The only difference... there is no jalapeño net in MY fridge
